page.title: 03ALNE COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {ALNE COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL} In Alne there have been three schools including the present one.It is a modern school building with three {classrooms}which are open on one side. Two junior classrooms share an art area. We have a spare temporary classroom which is used for music.There are three{teachers}and one part time teacher.We have a heated open air swimming pool and a large field use for sports.There are{74children}in the school and most come to school by a special school bus which brings children from the villages of Aldwark,Flawith and Tholthorpe.The rest of the children come from Alne or they are brought to school by their parents in cars from Newton-on-Ouse and Tollerton.Most children live in Alne.
